mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(SUM( IF((temp.LATE_INTEREST=0 OR LATE_INTEREST IS NULL), (CASE WHEN temp.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) THEN ROUND(temp.repay_account*0.001*temp.latedays,2) WHEN temp.BORROWTYPE = 3 THEN ROUND(temp.repay_account*0.002*temp.latedays,2) ELSE 0 END), temp.LATE_INTEREST ) ),0) AS lateInterestTotal FROM ( SELECT b.BORROWTYPE,c.repay_account,c.LATE_INTEREST, CASE WHEN (r.`STATUS` = 1 AND r.IS_REPAIR_INTEREST = 0) THEN (CASE WHEN r.WEBSTATUS = 1 THEN DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(r.ADVANCETIME,'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME),'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d')) END) WHEN r.status = 0 THEN (CASE WHEN r.WEBSTATUS = 1 THEN DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(r.ADVANCETIME,'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d')) END ) END latedays FROM ROCKY_B_COLLECTIONRECORD c, rocky_b_tenderrecord t, rocky_borrow b, rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE 1=1 AND c.TENDER_ID=t.ID AND t.BORROW_ID = b.id AND r.BORROW_ID = b.id AND c.ORDER = r.ORDER AND t.user_id=#{memberId} AND ( t.IS_VIP=1 OR (t.IS_VIP=0 AND r.WEBSTATUS = 0) ) AND ( (r.`STATUS` = 1 AND r.IS_REPAIR_INTEREST = 0) OR r.status = 0 ) ) temp WHERE latedays > 0
SELECT sum(ftr.account) from t_first_tender_real ftr WHERE ftr.USER_ID = #{memberId} and ftr.status in (0,3)
SELECT sum(ftr.USE_MONEY) from t_first_tender_real ftr WHERE ftr.STATUS in (0,3) AND ftr.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT sum(ftr.USE_MONEY) from t_first_tender_real ftr WHERE ftr.STATUS = 3 AND ftr.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT SUM(b.ACCOUNT) FROM t_first_tender_detail b WHERE 1=1 and b.STATUS = 0 AND b.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT SUM(b.ACCOUNT) FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord b, rocky_borrow d WHERE 1=1 and b.STATUS = 0 AND b.USER_ID = #{memberId} AND d.ID = b.BORROW_ID AND (d.STATUS = 2 or d.STATUS = 3)
SELECT SUM(ACCOUNT) FROM rocky_b_subscribe where STATUS=1 and USER_ID= #{memberId}
SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(ROUND(INTEREST*COEF,8)+ROUND(CAPITAL*(COEF-1),8) - INTEREST_DIFF - INTEREST_MANAGE_FEE),0),2) diff FROM rocky_b_transfer WHERE STATUS=4 AND USER_ID = #{memberId};
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(INTEREST - INTEREST_DIFF),0) diff FROM t_first_transfer WHERE `STATUS` = 4 AND USER_ID = #{memberId};
SELECT SUM(C.TOTAL) FROM rocky_cashrecord C WHERE 1=1 and (C.STATUS = 0 OR C.STATUS = 1) AND C.USER_ID = #{memberId} and c.IS_CUSTODY!=1
SELECT SUM(c.INTEREST) FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c, rocky_b_tenderrecord t where 1=1 and (c.status=1 OR c.status=2 or c.status=3) AND c.TENDER_ID = t.id AND t.user_id=#{memberId}
SELECT SUM(c.ACCOUNT) FROM t_fix_tender_detail c where 1=1 and (c.status=0 OR c.status=1 ) AND c.user_id=#{memberId}
SELECT SUM(c.INTEREST) FROM t_fix_collectionrecord c where 1=1 and c.status=0 AND c.user_id=#{memberId}
SELECT SUM(c.INTEREST) FROM t_fix_collectionrecord c where 1=1 and c.status=1 AND c.user_id=#{memberId}

select sum(c.capital) from rocky_b_collectionrecord c INNER JOIN rocky_b_tenderrecord r on c.TENDER_ID = r.id where 1=1 and c.status = 0 and c.USER_ID = #{memberId} and r.status = 1 and (c.FIRST_BORROW_ID is null or c.IS_FIRST_BORROW = 2)

SELECT ifnull(SUM( IF((temp.LATE_INTEREST=0 OR LATE_INTEREST IS NULL), (CASE WHEN temp.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) THEN ROUND(temp.repay_account*0.001*temp.latedays,2) WHEN temp.BORROWTYPE = 3 THEN ROUND(temp.repay_account*0.002*temp.latedays,2) ELSE 0 END), temp.LATE_INTEREST ) ),0) AS lateInterestTotal FROM ( SELECT b.BORROWTYPE,c.repay_account,c.LATE_INTEREST, CASE WHEN (r.`STATUS` = 1 AND r.IS_REPAIR_INTEREST = 0) THEN (CASE WHEN r.WEBSTATUS = 1 THEN DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(r.ADVANCETIME,'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME),'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d')) END) WHEN r.status = 0 THEN (CASE WHEN r.WEBSTATUS = 1 THEN DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(r.ADVANCETIME,'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d')) END ) END latedays FROM ROCKY_B_COLLECTIONRECORD c, rocky_b_tenderrecord t, rocky_borrow b, rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE 1=1 and c.FIRST_BORROW_ID is null and c.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID is null AND c.TENDER_ID=t.ID AND t.BORROW_ID = b.id AND r.BORROW_ID = b.id AND c.ORDER = r.ORDER AND t.user_id= #{memberId} AND ( t.IS_VIP=1 OR (t.IS_VIP=0 AND r.WEBSTATUS = 0) ) AND ( (r.`STATUS` = 1 AND r.IS_REPAIR_INTEREST = 0) OR r.status = 0 ) ) temp WHERE latedays > 0
SELECT SUM(c.INTEREST) FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c, rocky_b_tenderrecord t WHERE c.status=0 AND c.TENDER_ID = t.id AND t.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT SUM(money) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE user_id=#{memberId} AND TYPE='interest_back';

SELECT t.RATIO as ratio, SUM(c.INTEREST) as interest FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t, rocky_borrow b, rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.STATUS = 0 AND t.USER_ID = #{memberId} AND t.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND c.TENDER_ID = t.ID AND (b.BORROWTYPE = 2 or b.BORROWTYPE = 1 or b.BORROWTYPE = 5) AND NOT(c.FIRST_BORROW_ID IS NOT NULL AND c.IS_FIRST_BORROW=1 AND c.REPAY_TIME>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2015-03-10')) GROUP BY t.RATIO
SELECT SUM(b.LATE_INTEREST) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord b WHERE b.STATUS = 1 AND b.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT SUM(C.fee) FROM rocky_cashrecord C WHERE (C.STATUS = 2) AND C.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT SUM(b.INTEREST) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord b WHERE b.STATUS = 1 AND b.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT SUM(b.INTEREST) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord b WHERE b.STATUS = 0 AND b.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT SUM(R.FEE) FROM rocky_rechargerecord R WHERE R.STATUS = '1' AND R.USER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(ROUND(INTEREST*COEF,8)+ROUND(CAPITAL*(COEF-1),8) - INTEREST_DIFF - INTEREST_MANAGE_FEE),0),2) diff FROM rocky_b_transfer WHERE STATUS=4 AND USER_ID = #{userId} and SUCCESS_TIME BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{sDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{eDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(INTEREST - INTEREST_DIFF),0) diff FROM t_first_transfer WHERE `STATUS` = 4 AND USER_ID = #{userId} and SUCCESS_TIME BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{sDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{eDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(ROUND(BT.CAPITAL*(1-BT.COEF)*ROUND((BS.ACCOUNT/BT.ACCOUNT_REAL),8),8) + ROUND(BT.INTEREST_DIFF*ROUND((BS.ACCOUNT/BT.ACCOUNT_REAL),8),8) + ROUND(BT.INTEREST*ROUND((BS.ACCOUNT/BT.ACCOUNT_REAL),8)*BS.RATIO,8) - ROUND(BT.INTEREST*BT.COEF*ROUND((BS.ACCOUNT/BT.ACCOUNT_REAL),8),8)),0),2) diff FROM rocky_b_transfer BT INNER JOIN rocky_b_subscribe BS ON BT.ID = BS.TRANSFER_ID AND BS.`STATUS` = 3 WHERE BT.`STATUS` = 4 AND BS.USER_ID = #{userId} and SUCCESS_TIME BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{sDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{eDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(INTEREST_DIFF - INTEREST),0) diff FROM t_first_transfer FT INNER JOIN t_first_subscribe FS ON FS.FIRST_TRANSFER_ID = FT.ID AND FS.`STATUS` = 3 WHERE FT.`STATUS` = 4 AND FS.USER_ID = #{userId} and SUCCESS_TIME BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{sDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{eDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT IFNULL(bc.CAPITAL,0) as BCapitalTotal,IFNULL(bc.INTEREST,0) as BInterstTotal from (SELECT SUM(CAPITAL) as CAPITAL,SUM(INTEREST) as INTEREST,USER_ID FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord WHERE `STATUS`=0 and USER_ID<100000000 AND USER_ID=#{userId} ) bc where 1=1 and bc.USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT IFNULL(fix.fixCapitalTotal,0) as fixCapitalTotal,IFNULL(coll.fixInvestNoTotal,0) as fixInterstTotal from (SELECT USER_ID,SUM(c.ACCOUNT) as fixCapitalTotal FROM t_fix_tender_detail c where c.status in(0,1) and USER_ID=#{userId}) fix LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID,SUM(co.INTEREST) as fixInvestNoTotal FROM t_fix_collectionrecord co where co.status=0 and USER_ID=#{userId}) coll on fix.USER_ID = coll.USER_ID where 1=1 and fix.USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT IFNULL(ca.TOTAL,0) as curTotal from t_cur_account ca where 1=1 and ca.`STATUS`=0 and ca.USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT IFNULL(a.TOTAL,0) as raTotal,IFNULL(a.collection,0)+IFNULL(a.e_collection,0) as tenderTotal, IFNULL(a.use_money,0)+IFNULL(a.e_use_money,0)+IFNULL(a.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY,0)+IFNULL(a.no_use_money,0)+IFNULL(a.e_freeze_money,0) as useMoneyTotal, IFNULL(a.no_use_money,0)+IFNULL(a.e_freeze_money,0) as freezeTotal,IFNULL(a.use_money,0)+IFNULL(a.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY,0) as pUseMoneyTotal, IFNULL(a.no_use_money,0) as pFreezeTotal,IFNULL(a.e_use_money,0) as eUseMoneyTotal,IFNULL(a.e_freeze_money,0) as eFreezeTotal, IFNULL(a.collection,0)+IFNULL(a.e_collection,0) as raCollectionTotal, IFNULL(a.DRAW_MONEY,0) as drawMoney,IFNULL(a.NO_DRAW_MONEY,0) as noDrawMoney, IFNULL(a.use_money,0)+IFNULL(a.e_use_money,0) as ptUseMoney,IFNULL(a.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY,0) as firstUseMoney from rocky_account a where 1=1 and a.USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(yes_PAY_INTEREST), 0) FROM ( SELECT t1.TENDER_ID, t1.PAY_INTEREST, t1.collection_interest, t2.total_interest, IFNULL(ROUND(t1.PAY_INTEREST*(t1.collection_interest/t2.total_interest), 2),0) as yes_PAY_INTEREST FROM ( SELECT s.TENDER_ID, s.PAY_INTEREST, SUM(c.INTEREST) collection_interest FROM rocky_b_subscribe s, rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE s.USER_ID = #{userId} AND s.`STATUS` = 3 AND s.TENDER_ID = c.TENDER_ID AND c.`STATUS` = 0 GROUP BY s.TENDER_ID ) t1,( SELECT s.TENDER_ID, s.PAY_INTEREST, SUM(c.INTEREST) total_interest FROM rocky_b_subscribe s, rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE s.USER_ID = #{userId} AND s.`STATUS` = 3 AND s.TENDER_ID = c.TENDER_ID AND c.`STATUS` >= 0 GROUP BY s.TENDER_ID ) t2 WHERE t1.TENDER_ID = t2.TENDER_ID ) t
